messages.content: Give a day program for a trip to Paris

Day 1: Paris
* Start your day with a visit to le Notre-Dame Cathedral, one of the most famous landmarks in Paris, and explore the neoclassical architecture that surrounds it.
* Visit the Louvre Museum to learn about the history of art and design in France.
* Take a boat tour of the Seine River to see the famous bridges and tourist attractions of the city.
* Visit the Place de la Concorde to see the beautiful gardens and the Eiffel Tower.
Day 2: Paris
* Start your day with a visit to Montparnasse Tower. This iconic landmark is one of the most iconic symbols of Paris, and it's a great place to take photos and enjoy the view.
* Visit the Eiffel Tower to see the famous landmark from a different angle.
* Take a tour of the Notre-Dame Cathedral to learn more about the history and significance of the church.
* Visit the Louvre Museum to see the famous paintings and sculptures of Leonardo da Vinci, as well as other famous works of art.
